title: Insurance Appraisal
description: To establish the average retail replacement value for your jewelry and provide a basis for obtaining insurance coverage for loss, damage or theft.

title: Estate / Probate
description: To establish the Fair Market Value for your jewelry and provide a basis for establishing tax liability and/or the distribution of the jewelry between the heirs.

title: Fair Market Value
description: A Fair Market Value appraisal is requested by an owner who wishes to convert their jewelry item(s) into cash.

title: Selling your jewelry
description: This process involves more than placing a monetary value on your jewelry. It is a step by step consultation of understanding the value of your jewelry and the appropriate secondary market to sell your jewelry. Jewelry Appraisal Inc, specializes in diamonds, colored stones and designer vintage jewelry.

title: Gemological services
description: Jewelry Appraisal Inc, offers services in the complex areas of gemstone identification, synthetic and natural stone separation, enhancements and treatments, as well as diamond grading and colored stone grading, pearls and antique and period jewelry.

title: Large collections
description: For large collections or estates, I offer on-site appraisal services in the comfort and safety of your home, office or bank. Evaluations can be performed while you watch.
